service.title: CalDAV Managed Attachments
service.documentation: This specification defines an extension to the calendar access protocol (CalDAV) to allow attachments associated with iCalendar data to be stored and managed on the server.

http-header.documentation: The Cal-Managed-ID response header field provides the value of the MANAGED-ID parameter corresponding to a newly added ATTACH property. It MUST be sent only in response to a successful POST request with an action set to attachment-add or attachment-update.
